Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "Holy Maiden, you're finally here. And you, heroes.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'I would prefer not to be classified together with them.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Demon King "Celica" stood right in front of us. She turned over and greeted us like friends.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Could you tell us why we have to fight?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Because the Demon King must be defeated by heroes. Only by doing so can you bring peace to the world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We have already defeated the King. Is that not enough?', 3: '15', 4: 'We can have world peace if you stop what you are doing.', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Of course not. He was only a system bug, not a condition for world peace.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'More Kings like him would be created if I stop now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'This game world was originally set in the way that, peace would be restored once the heroes had defeated the Demon King.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: "In the last run, the heroes didn't complete their quest but ended the game abruptly, causing the world to crash.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: "I didn't want to continue hurting others, so a system error occurred, creating a King who replaced my position.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Were you part of the reason why that King turned evil?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "Yes. That's why I wanted to stop his plan myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: "Unless you destroy me completely, this game will never end properly and it's a matter of time before the next King shows up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...Demon King, is killing you our only option?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "You're exactly right, Holy Maiden.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After the farewell message, the Demon King was engulfed in darkness, until an alien-like creature crawled out.'}
{3: 'That was the true form of the Demon King.'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Time to save the world, heroes!', 4: '1'}
